pageProduct.name: Poise Pads Extra 24 Bulk Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

POISE® Pads Extra for bladder leakage provide discreet protection for when light bladder leakage (LBL) occurs regularly. Holding one cup of liquid, they are 2x more absorbent than leading period pads.

  • Value pack (Up to 12 days supply (based on use of two pads per day).
  • 2x more absorbent than leading period pads
  • Trusted and reliable LBL protection - 4 layer design quickly absorbs and locks away wetness into the super absorbent ABSORB-LOC core. 
  • Ultimate dryness and freshness - soft, quick dry cover keeps you dry and comfortable all day. Change as required. 
  • Helps eliminate odour for utmost discretion. 
  • All day comfort and security - Hourglass shaped pad conforms to natural curves of body.
  • Individually wrapped - hygienic & discreet 
Poise Products have been voted by Australians as Reader's Digest Winner of Most Trusted Brand In Incontinence from 2017-2021.

Boxed Contents: 24 Pads

Size: 24 Pack

Directions

Please do not flush this product down the toilet.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

This packaging is recyclable in Australia through the REDcycle Program. To find your nearest drop off location, visit www.redcycle.net.au

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 4 PELD or LDPE
